sentence.Network_en: Megamalls and fast food restaurants line the highway system.

sentence.Network_en: Flying at 1,000 ft. he heard a peculiar noise from the rotors.

sentence.Network_en: The auguries of death are fast gathering round his head.
sentence.Network_cn: 死亡凶兆迅速地在他脑海中盘旋。
